property.name: Text
property.value: Activate Battle: During this card\'s battle, if there are cards in your Combo Area, draw 1 card and negate this skill for the duration of the battle. Awaken: When your life is at 4 or less : You may draw 3 cards and flip this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When this card attacks, draw 1 card. Activate Battle: During this card\'s battle, if there are cards in your Combo Area, draw 1 card and negate this skill for the duration of the battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Triple Strike. Permanent: If Supreme Showdown Vegeta is in play in your Battle Area, this card gains +10000 power. Auto: When your Battle Cards are placed in the Drop Area with Supreme Showdown Vegeta\'s skill, and your Leader Card is World Tournament, activate this skill. If there are no Supreme Showdown Son Goku in your Battle Area, you may play this card from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When you play this card, choose up to 1 of your opponent\'s Battle Cards with 10000 or less power and KO it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Barrier. Permanent: If Tiny Rivals Trunks is in play in your Battle Area, this card gains +5000 power and Double Strike.

property.name: Text
property.value: Triple Strike. Permanent: If Supreme Showdown Son Goku is in play in your Battle Area, this card gains +10000 power. Auto: When you play this card, if your Leader Card is World Tournament, you may choose 1 of your Battle Cards other than this card and place it in your Drop Area. If you do so, your opponent cannot activate Blocker for the duration of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Super Combo. Auto: When you combo with this card, if your Leader Card is World Tournament and your life is 5 or less, draw 1 card and this card gains +10000 combo power for the duration of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Critical. Permanent: If Tiny Rivals Son Goten is in play in your Battle Area, this card gains +5000 power and Double Strike for the duration of the battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Super Combo. Auto: When you combo with this card, if your Leader Card is red and your life is at 4 or less, you may choose 1 card in your hand and place it in your Drop Area. If you do so, this card gains +10000 combo power for the duration of the turn, then choose up to 1 red Son Goten and up to 1 red Trunks: Youth, each with 15000 or less power, add them from your deck to your hand, then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When this card is switched from Active Mode to Rest Mode with Secret Treaty Hercule\'s skill, draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Permanent: You can combo with this card from your Battle Area even when it is in Rest Mode. Activate Main: Choose this card and 1 World Tournament in your Battle Area and switch them to Rest Mode: Draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Counter Attack: Negate the attack, and play this card. Permanent: If Heroic Duo Son Gohan is in play in your Battle Area, this card gains +9000 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When you Combo with this card, choose up to 1 of your attacking cards. It gains Double Strike.

property.name: Text
property.value: Barrier. Auto: When you play this card, if your Leader Card is red, choose up to 1 of your red Battle Cards with 15000 or more power and switch it to Active Mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Permanent: If Dark Duo Babidi is in play in your Battle Area, this card gains Barrier. Auto: When you play this card, choose up to 2 cards in your opponent\'s hand and send them to their Warp. Auto: When this card leaves the Battle Area, your opponent adds all cards sent to the Warp with this card\'s skill to their hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When you play this card, choose up to 1 card in your Battle Area and place up to 5 cards from the top of your deck under the chosen card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Permanent: This card gains +5000 power for each card placed under it. Auto: When your opponent attacks with one of their cards, place 1 card from the top of your deck under this card, then if there are 5 or more cards placed under this card, place this card in your Drop Area.

property.name: Text
property.value: Field. Activate Main: Switch this card to Rest Mode: Look at 1 card from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 Dabura, Pui Pui, or Yakon and add it to your hand, then place the rest on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When this card attacks a Leader Card, draw 1 card. Awaken: When your life is at 4 or less: You may choose up to 2 of your energy, switch them to Active Mode, and flip this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When this card attacks, draw 1 card. Activate Main: Choose 1 card from your life and add it to your hand: Choose up to 1 of your opponent\'s Battle Cards and return it to its owner\'s hand, and this card gains +5000 power for the duration of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Double Strike. Auto: When you play this card, if your Leader Card is World Tournament, you may choose 1 Test of Strength Uub from your hand and play it. If you do so, both this card and that card gain +5000 power for the duration of the turn.

card.name: Top of His Game Son Gohan

property.name: Text
property.value: Super Combo. Auto: When you combo with this card, if your Leader Card is World Tournament and you have 5 or less life, draw 1 card, and this card gains +10000 combo power for the duration of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Activate Main: Once per turn: Choose 1 card from your life and add it to your hand: If Scuffle Time Mr. Buu is in play in your Battle Area, choose this card and up to 1 of your energy and switch them to Active Mode, and this card gains +10000 power for the duration of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dual Attack. Permanent: If your Leader Card is a blue World Tournament and Hercule, Proudest Grandpa is in play in your Battle Area, this card gains +10000 power and Double Strike.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When this card attacks, you may choose 1 card from your life and add it to your hand. If you do so, this card gains +10000 power for the duration of the turn. Auto: At the end of your turn, return this card to its owner\'s hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Barrier. Auto: When you play this card, if your Leader Card is World Tournament and Begrudging Respect Piccolo is in play in your Battle Area, your opponent chooses 2 cards from their hand and places them on top of their deck in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: Activate Main: Once per turn: Choose 1 Awkward Situation Otokosuki in your Battle Area and place it at the bottom of its owner\'s deck: If your Leader Card is World Tournament, choose up to 1 of your opponent\'s Battle Cards and KO it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Barrier. Permanent: If Begrudging Respect Vegeta is in play in your Battle Area, this card gains Bloccker. Auto: When you play this card, if you placed a card in your Energy Area during this turn\'s Charge Phase and you have less energy than your opponent, choose up to 1 of your opponent\'s energy and place it in their Drop Area.

property.name: Text
property.value: Barrier. Activate Main: Place this card on the bottom of its owner\'s deck: If Scuffle Time Son Goten is in play in your Battle Area, choose up to 1 of your opponent\'s Battle Cards and return it to its owner\'s hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Barrier. Auto: When your Pan, Proudest Daughter is played in your Battle Area, draw up to 2 cards, then, at the end of your turn, choose up to 1 of your energy and switch it to Active Mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Critical. Auto: When you play this card, if Test of Strength Son Goku is in play in your Battle Area, choose up to 2 of you opponent\'s Battle Cards with 2000 or less power and place them at the bottom of their owners\' decks.

property.name: Text
property.value: Permanent: If Awkward Situation Trunks is in play in your Battle Area and Awkward Situation Otokosuki is not, you can play this card from your hand without paying its energy cost.

property.name: Text
property.value: Activate Battle: If your Leader Card is Uub, it gains +10000 power for the duration of the battle, and you draw 1 card.

property.name: Text

property.value: Auto: Once per turn: When this card attacks, draw 1 card, and this card gains +5000 power for the duration of the turn. Auto: Once per turn: When this card KO-s one of your opponent\'s Battle Card, switch this card to Active Mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Double Strike. Auto: When you play this card, if Fateful Reunion Chi-Chi is in play in your Battle Area, choose up to 1 of your opponent\'s Battle Cards, KO it, and this card gains +10000 power for the duration of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When you play this card, if your Leader Card is World Tournament and your opponent has 5 or more cards in their hand, your opponent chooses 1 card in their hand and places it in their Drop Area.

property.name: Text
property.value: Barrier. Auto: When Fateful Reunion Son Goku is played in your Battle Area, choose this card and 1 of your Fateful Reunion Son Goku, and they gain +10000 power for the duration of the turn, then draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Super Combo. Auto: When you combo with this card, if your Leader Card is World Tournament and your life is 5 or less, draw 1 card and this card gains +10000 combo power for the duration of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Critical. Auto: When this card attacks, choose up to 1 each of your and your opponent\'s Battle Cards and KO them. If you KO-ed Destined Conclusion Hero as your Battle Card, for the duration of the turn this card gains +10000 power and Triple Strike.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When you play this card, choose up to 1 of your opponent\'s Battle Cards with an energy cost of 2 or less ignoring Barrier and KO it.

You cannot place your opponent\'s hand in their Drop Area using Destined Conclusion Hero\'s skill for the duration of the turn.

property.value: Auto: When you play this card, you may choose 1 card in your life and add it to your hand. If you do so, choose up to 1 of your opponent\'s Battle Cards, switch it to Rest Mode, and this card gains +10000 power for the duration of the turn.

property.value: Auto: When you play this card, choose up to 1 of your opponent\'s Battle Cards with an energy cost of 3 or less, switch it to Rest Mode, and this card gains +5000 power for the duration of the turn.
